TopoDroid is an Open Source Android app for surveying caves with the DistoX. 

No warranty: by using it you agree that the author is not responsible for any loss of data you might incur or damage whatsoever. 

Visit http://sites.google.com/site/speleoapps for complementary apps and docs. 
Send comments, bug reports, feature requests, to marco.corvi@gmail.com

[1] Select either to upload a firmware or to dump the firmware to a file. 
[2] Choose the file to upload or save. Firmware files are in the bin directory. 
[3] Make sure the upload firmware version is compatible with the DistoX hardware version. 
[4] Put the DistoX2 in bootloader mode: press PLUS and MINUS while switching on with DIST key. 
[5] Tap the OK button. 
[6] Confirm to continue and wait till the process is done. 
[7] Turn off the DistoX2 with the CLR key.
Firmware file does not look correct.\nUpload anyways?
